name: Cuberspeed gan Mirror Cube uv Coated Speed Cube Purple Gan Mirror Blocks Magnetic Cube Puzzle
short_description: The GAN Mirror M (UV Coated) is the pinnacle of mirror cube design. This puzzle has all of the magnets and performance of the original GAN Mirror M, but this one is UV coated! This gives it a glossy finish that gives better grip and there is no risk of the stickers peeling.

GAN Mirror M uses a new visual design with a 3 x 3 speed cube, which is not solved by colors but by shapes; GAN mirror cube will bring you more fun and challenge while using the same method as a regular 3x3 speed cube

GAN Cube Mirror M features 48 magnets to make the cube faster and prevents locking up from rotating less than 90°; The corners and edge pieces are specially designed to create a smoother feel and have an anti-locking lubricant

The Speed Cube increase the intelligence of the kids, to release the working pressure of the adults, to help prevent a decline in memory of the elderly. Suitable for beginner and professional player. Enjoy hours of fun with you family and friends.

name: CuberShop Moyu Mirror Cube V2 M 3x3x3 Magnetic Speed Cube Blue, 2025 New Funny Variant of 3x3 Speed Cube, Affordable Smooth Fast, Blue Color Magnets Irregular Magic Cube (UV Coated Magic Clothes)
short_description: 🔮 Beyond the Basics – Enter the World of Mirror Cubing! – The Mirror Cube V2 is not just another cube—it's a whole new challenge that tests your ability to solve based on shape instead of color. Push your skills further and experience a fresh cubing adventure! 🌀

🧲 Magnetic Precision – Enhanced Stability and Control – With 48 edge & corner positioning magnets, this version offers stronger alignment and a crisper, more controlled solving experience compared to the non-magnetic version. 🎯

✨ Luxurious Magic Cloth Finish – Smooth & Durable – The magnetic Mirror Cube V2 is coated with a premium Magic Cloth texture that enhances grip, resists scratches, and keeps your cube looking brand new! 💎
🚀 Faster and More Reliable – Solve with Confidence – Magnetic attraction between pieces helps prevent overshooting and misalignments, allowing smoother and more accurate turns for faster solving. ⚡

🎨 Elegant Color Options – Stand Out from the Crowd – Available in Blue and Green, this version combines aesthetic appeal with performance, making it the perfect choice for cubers who appreciate both style and functionality. 🌟
🏆 Redefining Mirror Speedcubing – Break the Speed Bias – Unlike traditional mirror cubes, the Mirror Cube V2 is designed to support advanced speedcubing techniques, making fast solving a reality. 🎟️

🔄 Adjustable Tension System – Tailor Your Solve – High-precision springs allow for customizable tension adjustments, ensuring accurate rebound and control for a solving experience that fits your style. 🔄
🔮 Enhanced Corner-Cutting with 20° Fault Tolerance – The large rounded corner design increases fault tolerance, allowing smoother turns without jamming or lockups. 🎯
product_description: Looking for a new challenge? The Moyu Mirror Cube V2 Magnetic Version transforms solving with a strong magnetic positioning system, helping each turn snap into place for crisp, precise movements. Designed for effortless shape-based solving, this cube features a high-quality Magic Cloth surface that enhances grip and resists wear, ensuring a premium feel every time you solve. With aesthetic Blue and Green color options, this cube not only performs exceptionally but also looks stunning in any collection. Take on the mirror challenge with the added power of magnets!

name: Cuberspeed moyu Mirror Cube v2 Blue Speed Cube Mirror Blocks Shades Moyu Mirror Cube Magic Cube Puzzle Toys
short_description: The MFJS Mirror Cube 3x3 V2 is a shape-mod transformation of a classic 3x3 puzzle, where you solve based on shape rather than color. Featuring an upgraded mechanism from its predecessor, this version offers smoother turning, improved stability, and better corner-cutting for an enhanced solving experience. The cube's varying block sizes create a unique challenge as it becomes increasingly scrambled, making it a great choice for both puzzle enthusiasts and collectors. Perfect for those looking to test their spatial awareness and problem-solving skills!

name: Speed Cube 3x3, Metallic Magic Cube 2025, Magnetic Reflective Mirror Cube, Stickerless Personalized Shiny Cube Puzzles Gift for Birthday Christmas
short_description: 【Stylish Display】The GONINO Speed Cube comes in a sleek, transparent acrylic box, adding excitement to the unboxing experience. It includes both a display stand and a showcase box, providing two stylish ways to present your cube. Plus, a beautifully crafted mini screwdriver is included, offering DIY enthusiasts the chance to customize and personalize their cube. Its premium packaging makes it an excellent toy gift for both kids and adults.

【Premium Material】Crafted from premium, eco-friendly ABS material, the GONINO magic cube is durable, lightweight, and non-toxic. The stickerless design won’t fade or peel, and the anti-pop structure ensures smooth, stable turns. The sleek metallic finish enhances the traditional design with a vibrant look, providing both an exceptional cubing experience and a stylish display piece.

【Magnetic Design】The GONINO Speedcube features hidden magnets for precise control and smooth, stable turns. Its corner contact design ensures superior corner-cutting, while adjustable tension and anti-pop technology make it perfect for speed, stability, and durability. Comfortable to hold, it’s ideal for both casual cubers and serious competitors.

【Brain Puzzle Cube】The GONINO 3x3 Speed Cube isn’t just a game—it’s a fun way to sharpen your mind! Perfect for all ages, it boosts memory, enhances problem-solving skills, builds focus, and relieves stress. Whether you’re a beginner or a pro, it’s the ultimate blend of entertainment and mental exercise.

【Gift for All Ages】Looking for a perfect gift? This GONINO Magnetic Mirror Speed Cube offers a timeless, classic appeal for all ages, providing entertainment, mental stimulation, and stress relief. Compact, portable, and stylish, it’s an ideal gift that’s easy to carry and display anywhere—whether at home, in the office, or on the go. The unique packaging adds an extra touch, making it a truly memorable gift.
